title: 96/183/EC: Commission Decision of 21 February 1996 amending Decision 94/14/EC setting up the list of establishments in the Community for which are granted temporary and limited derogation from specific Community health rules on the production and marketing of fresh meat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 February 1996 amending Decision 94/14/EC setting up the list of establishments in the Community for which are granted temporary and limited derogation from specific Community health rules on the production and marketing of fresh meat (Text with EEA relevance) (96/183/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The establishments listed in the Annex are hereby added to the list set out in Decision 94/14/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 February 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 105.
(2) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 2012/64.
(3) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 7.
(4) OJ No L 14, 17. 1. 1994, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 42, 24. 2. 1995, p. 44.
ANNEX
List of Community establishments for which is granted a temporary and limited derogation - Council Directive 91/498/EEC
>TABLE>
